review:
its been 2 years since my treatment. After 6-9 months i started some pain with the root canal. It gets healed itself after a month or so. I didn't find time to go back and get it treated. Later when i checked the prices. Treatment here is a costly than outside. Knowing all these I still took a chance and referred my in-laws for treatment there. *** ********* ** ********* *** **** **** * ***** ** ***** *** *** ********** When we took a step back they're speaking about the discount which they haven't provided me when I was treated. The patients who agree for the treatment will not get any discount here. If you say no to the treatment, thats when you'll get a discount. They do a lot of followups to get the treatment done.. they treat u so good that u can't say a no out of hesitation. They do a lot of followup for a 5 star rating on google reviews as well. When they handover the summary post treatment they'll for sure with a warm talk and nice smile ask for a 5 star review for which u hesitate again even to reduce a star.

I'm not against the clinic.. just asking everyone not to fall for the behavior, respect, smiles, etc. **** ** *** ***** ******* ***** **** ******* It's we who should be mindful and compare the cost, treatment and follow up reviews and then take a decision. You're spending a lot of hard earned money for your dental issues. Its no wrong in thinking twice in an effort to save. Please don't go here looking at these reviews. These are all exaggerated. Consider the 1 star and 2 star reviews as well and think wise.
